page.title: 11Leisure in the Bramley area.
page.content: { The most popular hobbies in Bramley were watching TV,gardening, watching sport, and DIY. A few people like reading and knitting.{About half of {all people belong to a Club or a {Society.}Many of the groups which people belong to are at Wickersley which is outside our area of study. { In Bramley, the main meeting places are the schools, Village Hall, Parish Hall, Miner's Welfare, the British Legion and the Workingmen's Club.These venues support the Pram Group,Parent's Group,Mother's Union, play school,and Sunday school.There are no special places for concerts,films or plays. { Children}can join the Youth Club, Boy or Girl's Brigade, Scouts, or Guides. There are many school sports teams. { Adults}enjoy a drink and chat at 1 of the 5 pubs. Animal lovers may join the dog fanciers,pigeon, or fishing club.
